2763.56.text: The uninitiated always watch the performance from a distance,

2766.56.text: moved by the strange sounds they hear.

2769.55.text: They truly believe these sounds emanate from another world.

2801.04.text: The warrior chief beats the ground with his ceremonial tail.

2804.61.text: From the nest, the water drums reply.

2807.25.text: All the elements must be co-ordinated,

2810.00.text: so the spirit of the king of crocodiles will come and possess the initiated.

2823.80.text: They believe that in the beginning there was only water.

2826.54.text: The crocodile then created the earth and formed an enormous crack in it.

2830.57.text: The crocodile then fertilised it, and gave rise to all the species of the earth.

2836.17.text: He then opened his mouth, and from his upper jaw came the sky,

2840.82.text: and from the lower jaw the ground.

2854.64.text: The initiate is led into the tambaran.

2857.09.text: On this occasion, it is a man who had already been initiated,

2860.22.text: but had lived for many years outside his community.

2863.52.text: Now, by means of sacrifice, he publicly reaffirms that he belongs here,

2868.22.text: and wishes to rid himself of the outside influences that have contaminated him.

2891.24.text: Outside, the warriors continue to shout encouragement to the great spirit.

2895.24.text: Soon, purifying blood will be spilt.

2904.68.text: Lying on a board, and aided by an acolyte,

2907.10.text: the initiate awaits the contact of the knife.

2910.12.text: He will have eaten narcotic plants, which daze him and dull the pain,

2914.42.text: though on this occasion his skin will be scarred

2917.24.text: with only the final few cuts of confirmation.

2935.12.text: The wounds are covered with mud and with Gwak,

2937.37.text: a vegetable oil with powerful antiseptic properties.

2940.66.text: The result will be scars in the form of scales.

2961.80.text: The initiate is led to the nest of the great spirit.

2965.31.text: He is now a crocodile man.

2978.51.text: The symbiosis of man and reptile keeps alive the ancestral codes

2983.04.text: of the great river of black waters.
